entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:18 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -42.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 36. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early this morning. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 61 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
